Wukerplank

Building a blog with Rails 3.2

Gary Benton from K3 Integrations did a really interesting screencast about the creation of a blog with Rails 3.2.

The template Gary uses can be found here.

It can be used like this:

    rails new -m https://raw.github.com/RailsApps/rails3-application-templates/master/rails3-bootstrap-devise-cancan-template.rb
